description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Townsville, Australia. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Lush Tropical Leisure at Mercure Townsville Resort
hotels.description: Comfort and convenience go hand-in-hand on the lush resort grounds of Mercure Townsville, just minutes away from the airport and the heart of town. Whether you’re swimming the Great Barrier Reef or walking the sandy stretches of Townsville’s spectacular beaches, you can return to your verdant haven and unwind after long days spent exploring Tropical North Queensland. Savour hearty al fresco dining at poolside Celsius Restaurant and Bar, using fresh local produce to bring their culinary vision to life. With spacious rooms featuring light and airy design, Townsville’s largest freeform pool and outdoor spa, your time at Mercure Townsville is sure to impress.

hotels.title: Contemporary Townsville Escape with Infinity Pool & Jacuzzi
hotels.description: Run away to Tropical North Queensland with a stay at Oaks Townsville Gateway Suites. Perfectly positioned to explore Townsville's vibrant dining scene, this contemporary retreat offers easy access to the iconic Great Barrier Reef and Magnetic Island. Savour the culinary delights of Palmer Street, just a short stroll away, before returning to your room or apartment to admire the stunning city and marina views, or taking a scenic dip in the elevated infinity pool.

seo.title: Hôtels à Townsville - Australie Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trouvez les meilleurs hôtels à Townsville, Australia avec des offres exclusives. Réservez votre escapade parfaite avec jusqu'à 60% de réduction.
